FUNCTION_BLOCK FB_PT1Filter
VAR_INPUT
	rInput: REAL:= 0.0; 								//输入数据
	rK: REAL:= 1.0; 									//增益
	tT: TIME; 											//时间参数
END_VAR
VAR_OUTPUT
	rOutput: REAL:= 0.0;  								//输出数据
END_VAR
VAR
	_rT: LREAL;
	_rY: LREAL;
END_VAR

IF _rT = 0.0 THEN
	rOutput:= rInput; 									//输出数据初始化
END_IF

_rT:= TIME_TO_REAL(tT) /10;								//10为PLC的采样周期，单位为ms

IF ABS(rOutput - rInput) < 1E-6 THEN
	rOutput:= rInput; 									//防止除零
ELSIF _rT > 0.0 THEN
	rOutput:= (rK / _rT) * rInput + (1.0 - (1.0 / _rT)) * _rY;
ELSE
	rOutput:= rInput;  									//如果时间常数小于等于零请输出等于输入
END_IF
_rY:= rOutput;
